devdoc.details: The interface a contract MUST implement if it is the implementer of some (other) interface for any address other than itself.

params.addr: Address for which the contract will implement the interface
params.interfaceHash: keccak256 hash of the name of the interface

returns._0: ERC1820_ACCEPT_MAGIC only if the contract implements 'interfaceHash' for the address 'addr'.

canImplementInterfaceForAddress(bytes32,.notice: Indicates whether the contract implements the interface 'interfaceHash' for the address 'addr' or not.

devdoc.author: Jordi Baylina and Jacques Dafflon
devdoc.details: This contract is the official implementation of the ERC1820 Registry For more details, see https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1820 Compiler used: optimistic-solc Runtime target: OVM

params._addr: Address being queried for the implementer of an interface. (If '_addr' is the zero address then 'msg.sender' is assumed.)
params._interfaceHash: Keccak256 hash of the name of the interface as a string. E.g., 'web3.utils.keccak256("ERC777TokensRecipient")' for the 'ERC777TokensRecipient' interface.

returns._0: The address of the contract which implements the interface '_interfaceHash' for '_addr' or '0' if '_addr' did not register an implementer for this interface.

params._addr: Address for which to return the manager.

returns._0: Address of the manager for a given address.

params._contract: Address of the contract to check.
Address of the contract to check.

returns._0: The keccak256 hash of an interface name.

params._addr: Address for which to set the interface. (If '_addr' is the zero address then 'msg.sender' is assumed.)
params._interfaceHash: Keccak256 hash of the name of the interface as a string. E.g., 'web3.utils.keccak256("ERC777TokensRecipient")' for the 'ERC777TokensRecipient' interface.

params._addr: Address for which to set the new manager.
params._newManager: Address of the new manager for 'addr'. (Pass '0x0' to reset the manager to '_addr'.)

params._contract: Address of the contract for which to update the cache.
params._interfaceId: ERC165 interface for which to update the cache.

InterfaceImplementerSet(address,bytes32,.notice: Indicates a contract is the 'implementer' of 'interfaceHash' for 'addr'.

ManagerChanged(address,address).notice: Indicates 'newManager' is the address of the new manager for 'addr'.

getInterfaceImplementer(address,bytes32).notice: Query if an address implements an interface and through which contract.

getManager(address).notice: Get the manager of an address.

implementsERC165InterfaceNoCache(address.notice: Checks whether a contract implements an ERC165 interface or not without using nor updating the cache.

interfaceHash(string).notice: Compute the keccak256 hash of an interface given its name.

setInterfaceImplementer(address,bytes32,.notice: Sets the contract which implements a specific interface for an address. Only the manager defined for that address can set it. (Each address is the manager for itself until it sets a new manager.)

setManager(address,address).notice: Sets '_newManager' as manager for '_addr'. The new manager will be able to call 'setInterfaceImplementer' for '_addr'.

updateERC165Cache(address,bytes4).notice: Updates the cache with whether the contract implements an ERC165 interface or not.
